Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 3 Āsavagocchaka » 3.5 Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka » 3.5.7 Pañhāvāra » 3.5.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 3.5.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Āsavagocchaka
Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
121.
1294Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1295Āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo āsavasampayuttassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
<< 3.5.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Ārammaṇādi >>
